patterns: Which is better PC or console?
responses: PC is better for perfomance and graphics but console is convenient for casual play.

Although preordering is a good indication of what potential sales will be like for a game for the company releasing the game. I would not recommend that you preorder as history has told us that big game releases do not tend to be fully finished upon releases and it would be advisable to wait until there has been a patch or two that fixes release day issues and bugs. This will give you a better indication if it's a game that you do actually want to play and is worth your money. Generally indie game developers release better quality games with fewer issues on release day and it would help them if you preordered their games.

patterns: Who is the best Formula 1 driver?
responses: There are many Formula 1 drivers that would be see as the greatest of all time but it would be difficult to say which one for definite is the best. As the sport is constatnly evolving it would be a bit unfair to compare drivers from different eras of Formula 1 based on the technology of the car at the time. The most successful driver in terms of championships won are both Michael Schumacher and Lewis Hamilton with 7 championship titles each, with Lewis Hamilton having more race wins. With that said everyone has an opinion on who their greatest of all time Formula 1 driver is and they are right to have that opinion. Some other drivers that are considered the greatest of all time are, Ayrton Senna, Sebastian Vettle, Alain Prost, Fernando Alonso and Max Verstappen just to name a few.
